data.title: Robert Mitchum Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Robert Mitchum with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Dropped out of school after 1930 and traveled the country via boxcar, briefly serving time on a Georgia chain gang for vagrancy

Claimed that his sad, sagging eyes were caused by chronic insomnia and a boxing injury

In 1948, was arrested for marijuana possession and served 43 days at a prison farm

His case was later overturned

In 1957, recorded the album Calypso Is Like So, while filming Heaven Knows, Mr

Allison in the Caribbean

Cowrote and performed "The Ballad of Thunder Road," the theme song of the 1958 movie Thunder Road, in which he starred

Speaking on his many roles in the film-noir genre: "I kept the same suit for six years and the same dialogue

They just changed the title of the picture and the leading lady

"
